name: Roguebuilder
description:
Controls:

Movement: WASD

Select Spell: 1, 2, 3, 4

Cast: ENTER/SPACE

Set Direction: Arrow Keys

You've fallen and have no way out. Traverse an endless, ever-shifting dungeon.

Make use of Runes, abilities that are unique to each individual who casts them to find your way out, or get as far as you can.

Inspired by Rogue(1980)

Made for the 2022 7DRL Game Jam.
